Just jumping in to say that I absolutely love Buckets! As someone from a so-called "third-world country", an annual license for YNAB would cost me as much as an entire month's rent... So your software is a godsend. I'm already saving up to acquire the license one day - even though it is still quite expensive in local currency, I feel it would be worth it - and for a fair price. Thanks a lot for working on this amazing piece of software!
PS.: Is there any way I could help complete the Portuguese localisation?
name: Jessica
